backend/main.mo: Implements an inquiry management canister with functions to submit inquiries, retrieve all or filtered inquiries, and store them in a map.
feature_evidence.json: Provides feature evidence metadata linking contact-section enhancements to specific frontend files and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styles used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based color variables for both light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that mounts the React app and loads the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component assembling the page layout with header, sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/site/BrandLogo.t: Logo component that loads the NK SYSTECH image with a styled text fallback on error.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Contact section providing direct call/WhatsApp buttons and an inquiry form with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer showing branding, quick navigation links, and full contact and address details.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo, desktop navigation, and mobile sheet-based menu.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Hero banner with headline, description, CTA buttons, and scroll-to-section behavior.
frontend/src/components/site/InquiryList: DEV-only collapsible panel showing a table of inquiries fetched from backend with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/site/ProductCate: Displays a grid of predefined product categories with items using cards.
frontend/src/components/site/ScrollToSec: Accessible link component that smoothly scrolls to a target section on click or key press.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Utility wrapper for page sections providing padding and container layout.
frontend/src/components/site/ServicesSec: Renders a services grid and technical work images inside a structured section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiryList.ts: Fetches inquiry list from backend using the actor, exposing loading, error, and refetch states.
Handles inquiry form validation and submission through the backend actor with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, stored identity loading, and context for authentication.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for themes, base styles, and utility extensions.
frontend/src/lib/serviceInterest.ts: Defines service interest options and provides helpers to map between frontend values, backend enum values, and display labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including version, summary, architectural notes, issues, and implemented features.
